  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person(String name, String gender) throws GenderException
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person.
      gender - The gender of the person. Must be either "male" or "female".
      Throws:
      GenderException - If the gender provided is not "male" or "female".

    • Person

      public Person(String name, String gender, LocalDate birthday, LocalDate deathdate) throws GenderException
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person.
      gender - The gender of the person. Must be either "male" or "female".
      birthday - The birthday of the person.
      deathdate - The day the person died.
      Throws:
      GenderException - If the gender provided is not "male" or "female".

    • Person

      public Person(String name, String gender, LocalDate birthday) throws GenderException
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person.
      gender - The gender of the person. Must be either "male" or "female".
      birthday - The birthday of the person.
      Throws:
      GenderException - If the gender provided is not "male" or "female".

      public List<Person> getParents()

    • getSpouse

      public Person getSpouse()
      Retrieves the spouse of the person. Assumes that current spouse will always be at the last index.
      Returns:
      the spouse of the person if they are married, otherwise null

    • isExOf

      public boolean isExOf(Person a)
      Checks if the current instance is considered an ex-partner of the provided person. An ex-partner is defined as a person who was previously in a relationship with the provided person, excluding the current instance if present and if the current instance is marked as married.
      Parameters:
      a - The person to check for ex-partnership.
      Returns:
      true if the current instance is considered an ex-partner based on its presence in the list of partners of the provided person, excluding itself if marked as the current partner and if marked as married, false otherwise.

    • createOppositeGender

      public Person createOppositeGender(Person a)
      Returns a new Person object with the opposite gender of the provided Person.
      Parameters:
      a - The Person object whose gender will be used to determine the opposite gender.
      Returns:
      A new Person object with the opposite gender of the provided Person.

    • createOppositeGender

      public Person createOppositeGender(String name, Person a)
      Creates a new Person object with the opposite gender of the specified person.
      Parameters:
      a - The Person whose gender opposite is to be determined.
      name - The name for the new Person object.
      Returns:
      A new Person object with the opposite gender of the specified person.

    • addChild

      public boolean addChild(Person child)
      Add child to Person's children and assign them as a parent
      Parameters:
      child - The Child to add to children
      Returns:
      true if the child was added successfully, false if the child was already present in the list of children.

    • isChildOf

      public boolean isChildOf(Person target)
      Checks if the current person is a child of the specified target person.
      Parameters:
      target - the target person to check if the current person is their child
      Returns:
      true if the current person is a child of the target person, false otherwise
